subject: Football
lead_paragraph: No matter how many touchdowns he scores, there is one statistic that Danny Woodhead, who signed with the Jets last week as an undrafted free agent, cannot escape. He is 5 feet 7 inches.
snippet: No matter how many touchdowns he scores, there is one statistic that Danny Woodhead, who signed with the Jets last week as an undrafted free agent, cannot escape. He is 5 feet 7 inches.
